content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #180

## May 2019 Ballot Comment:

Submitted by Anthony Julian
Chapter/section: Smart launch example
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: A-T Correction
In Person requested: Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Summary:

Comment: Hub is not a proper noun, should not be capitalized.

Existing wording: Note that the SMART launch parameters include the Hub's base url and and the session identifier in the cast-hub and hub.topic fields.
Proposed wording: Note that the SMART launch parameters include the hub's base url and and the session identifier in the cast-hub and hub.topic fields.

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._
